title: Quarterstaves
content: creatures. Topple Woe 1d8 (1d6) +2 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +2 Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Arcane Vampirism: When the creatures affected by your spells fail any associated Saving Throws regaitn 1~4 hit points.
